title: There’s no M1 Mac Pro yet, but AMD has new Radeon graphics cards for the Intel Mac Pro
content:
Apple revealed a handful of new devices on Monday, including the new iPhone SE with 5G connectivity, an iPad Air with an M1 chip, the Mac Studio, and an updated Studio Display. The company also teased that a Mac Pro hardware refresh was on the way, but we don’t know any details about that yet. In the meantime,

The post There’s no M1 Mac Pro yet, but AMD has new Radeon graphics cards for the Intel Mac Pro appeared first on xda-developers.
description: On the same day Apple showed off the graphical power of its new M1 Ultra chipset, AMD completed its new lineup of GPUs for the Mac Pro.
